properties.name: http.cors.allowedOrigins
properties.description: List of allowed origins, e.g. https://domain1.com.

properties.name: http.cors.allowedHeaders
properties.description: List of request headers that can be used during the actual request.

properties.name: http.cors.allowCredentials
properties.description: Whether the browser should include any cookies associated with the domain of the request being annotated.
